5' x 5'

$71
$ 49
00 Monthly
  • Provides 25 square feet of storage
  • Similar in size to a large closet
  • Can hold the contents of a small room or small garden shed
  • Able to fit one piece of small, narrow furniture and some boxes
  • Holds up to 50 medium boxes/totes
  • Ideal for storing holiday decorations, off-season clothing, gardening tools, sports equipment, or business records
Get Started Now

5' x 10'

$109
$ 69
00 Monthly
  • Provides 50 square feet of storage
  • Similar in size to a walk-in closet, large shed, or guest bedroom
  • Can hold the contents of a studio apartment or dorm room
  • Able to fit one to two pieces of furniture and up to 15-20 boxes or up to 120 medium boxes/totes
  • Ideal for off-site storage for businesses, decluttering projects, or off-season storage for clothing, sports equipment, gardening tools, and holiday decorations
Get Started Now

10' x 10'

$139
$ 129
00 Monthly
  • Provides 100 square feet of storage
  • Similar in size to a small bedroom or office
  • Can hold the contents of two bedrooms and a family room
  • Able to fit several pieces of furniture, mattresses, and a few major appliances or up to 215 medfium boxes/totes
  • Ideal for off-site storage for businesses, soring belongings during a home renovation, or when moving apartments
  • Can store motorcycles
Get Started Now

00 Monthly

  • Able to fit several pieces of furniture, mattresses, and a few major appliances or up to 215 medfium boxes/totes
  • Ideal for off-site storage for businesses, soring belongings during a home renovation, or when moving apartments
  • Can store motorcycles

10' x 20'

$ 259
00 Monthly
  • Provides 200 square feet of storage
  • Similar in size to a standard one-car garage
  • Can hold the contents of a 2 to 3 bedroom house
  • Can fit large pieces of furniture (such as couches or dressers), large appliances, and big-screen TVs
  • Often used when moving, relocating, or building a home or as off-site storage for larger businesses
  • Can store a compact car or multiple small vehicles (such as motorcycles or jet skis)
